categories_description: Select a category below to allocate your skill points
unlock_skills_hint: Gain points through practice to unlock skills
no_skills_unlocked_yet: You haven't unlocked any skills yet
point_usage_hint: Click the + button to upgrade skills in these categories

category_description.technique: Allocate points here to improve your playing technique. Points earned from exercises help you track your technical development.
category_description.theory: Distribute points to enhance your music theory knowledge. Balance this with other areas for well-rounded growth.
category_description.hearing: Assign points to improve your ear training abilities. Monitor your progress to avoid neglecting this important skill.
category_description.creativity: Use points to boost your creative expression skills. Track which areas you're developing and which need attention.

intro.title: Guitar Skill Development
intro.description: Distribute skill points earned from your practice sessions to develop specific areas of your playing.
intro.point1: Earn skill points by completing practice exercises
intro.point2: Allocate points according to which areas you want to develop
intro.point3: Track your progress to see which skills you're developing and which you're neglecting

alternate_picking.name: Alternate Picking
alternate_picking.description: Master the art of alternating between downstrokes and upstrokes

legato.name: Legato
legato.description: Smooth playing technique using hammer-ons and pull-offs

sweep_picking.name: Sweep Picking
sweep_picking.description: Advanced picking technique for playing arpeggios

scales.name: Scales Mastery
scales.description: Learn and master essential guitar scales

rhythm.name: Rhythm Mastery
rhythm.description: Develop precise timing and rhythm control

finger_independence.name: Finger Independence
finger_independence.description: Develop the ability to play independent finger movements

phrasing.name: Phrasings
phrasing.description: Develop the ability to play independent finger movements

articulation.name: Articulation
articulation.description: Master various sound articulation techniques for greater musical expression

bending.name: String Bending
bending.description: Master the art of bending strings for expressive playing

tapping.name: Two-Hand Tapping
tapping.description: Advanced technique using both hands on the fretboard

improvisation.name: Improvisation
improvisation.description: Create spontaneous musical ideas and solos

ear_training.name: Ear Training
ear_training.description: Develop the ability to recognize notes, intervals and chords by ear

sight_reading.name: Sight Reading
sight_reading.description: Learn to read and play music notation fluently

music_composition.name: Music Composition
music_composition.description: Learn to write and arrange your own music

pitch_recognition.name: Pitch Recognition
pitch_recognition.description: Develop perfect pitch and relative pitch abilities

harmony.name: Advanced Harmony
harmony.description: Master complex chord progressions and voice leading

vibrato.name: Vibrato Technique
vibrato.description: Master the art of adding expression through string vibration

music_theory.name: Advanced Music Theory
music_theory.description: Deep understanding of musical concepts and composition

rhythm_variations.name: Advanced Rhythm
rhythm_variations.description: Master complex time signatures and polyrhythms

songwriting.name: Songwriting
songwriting.description: Create complete songs with lyrics and arrangements

slide_guitar.name: Slide Guitar
slide_guitar.description: Master the technique of playing with a guitar slide

modal_theory.name: Modal Theory
modal_theory.description: Understanding and application of musical modes

audio_production.name: Audio Production
audio_production.description: Learn to record and produce guitar tracks

rythm_recognition.name: Rhythm Recognition
rythm_recognition.description: Develop the ability to recognize and reproduce complex rhythms

transcription.name: Transcription
transcription.description: Learn to write down music by ear in notation or tablature

picking.name: Picking
picking.description: Master basic picking techniques and precise string striking

music_theory_basics.name: Theory Basics
music_theory_basics.description: Fundamentals of musical notation and harmony

improvisation_basic.name: Basic Improvisation
improvisation_basic.description: Simple melodic improvisation over basic progressions

improvisation_intermediate.name: Intermediate Improvisation
improvisation_intermediate.description: Phrasing and more complex improvisational concepts

improvisation_advanced.name: Advanced Improvisation
improvisation_advanced.description: Developing unique voice and advanced techniques

composition_intermediate.name: Intermediate Composition
composition_intermediate.description: More complex song structures and arrangements

composition.name: Composition
composition.description: Learn to write and arrange your own music
